Post metadata ideas

See source code for implementation details. Seems to be mostly just reading yaml metadata fields and linking them to

  • gwern.net - created: & modified: for date post was started & last edited
  • status: seedling/budding/evergreen (conceptual)/deciduous (likely to break)
  • assumed audience (maggie appleton colophon)
  • reading time

Hugo themes

  • apvarun/digital-garden theme might be suitable for academic/professional showcase

Hugo guides

  • How I built my Digital Garden using Hugo has steps for setting up, good reference to send others to.
  • How much Hugo do I need to know? by Alison Hill

What I want

  • identity as hats/multi-faceted

    • adjustable bio length on Jason Lengstorf’s page

    • choose your own adventure between left/right brain; creative/analytical; a false dichotomy but a useful dimension reduction.

  • professional identity/show home – cynthiahqy.me
    • now page and listing on Derek Silver’s nownownow.com
    • project portfolio
    • data-driven CV
      • roles as “hats” à la some people I’ve been on Cat Hicks page
    • technical posts on coding, data sci, teaching, software dev
  • mind-caving/digital garden - xyathium.xyz
    • idea journal
    • philosophical writings
    • mental health
    • neurodiversity
  • Go on a retrieval mission to see how much of my past content I can still find

    • Wordpress – updated the password!
